name: HyperShot
storyline:
The more enemies you shoot, the more enemies spawn! 
 
Blast your way through 300 levels of replicating orbs that move around trying to kill you!
summary:
Blast your way through 300 levels of replicating orbs that move around trying to kill you. 
 
- Use the mouse to move the player around the screen. 
 
- Shoot Up, Down, Left, and Right to attack enemies. 
 
- Gain enough points to complete each level. 
 
- Some enemies follow you and can't be shot. They also block your shots. 
 
- 20 enemy types.
